text: City University of Health Sciences, Karachi also known by its old name Karachi Medical & Dental College (کراچی میڈیکل اینڈ ڈینٹل کالج) is a public medical university in Karachi. It was founded by Nazim of Karachi Farooq Sattar in 1991. It offers MBBS and BDS programs at undergraduate level which are accredited by the Pakistan Medical and Dental Council. KMDC also offers postgraduate specialties in medicine and dentistry in affiliation with the College of Physicians and Surgeons Pakistan and University of Karachi. ==References== ==External links== * KMDC official website Category:Medical colleges in Sindh Category:Universities and colleges in Karachi Category:Educational institutions established in 1991 Category:1991 establishments in Pakistan Category:Public universities and colleges in Sindh
title: City University of Health Sciences, Karachi
